title: Noam Chomsky: Neoliberalism Is Destroying Our Democracy
description:
How elites on both sides of the political spectrum have undermined our social, political and environmental commons. 

This interview comes from Open Source with Christopher Lydon, a weekly program about arts, ideas and politics. Listen to rest of the conversation with Chomsky here: http://radioopensource.org/american-socrates-life-mind-noam-chomsky/
